member.name: D3D12_SUBRESOURCE_DATA.pData
member.summary: A pointer to a memory block that contains the subresource data.

member.name: D3D12_SUBRESOURCE_DATA.RowPitch
member.summary: The row pitch, or width, or physical size, in bytes, of the subresource data.

member.name: D3D12_SUBRESOURCE_DATA.SlicePitch
member.summary: The depth pitch, or width, or physical size, in bytes, of the subresource data.
